description:
When performing an instance resize (migration) with the OSAPI and XenServer I get the following exception in my nova compute log:

(nova): TRACE: Error: ['XENAPI_PLUGIN_EXCEPTION', 'move_vhds_into_sr', 'OSError', "[Errno 17] File exists: '/var/run/sr-mount/35932a80-54d3-075f-5edf-c0d49edec77b/images//instance24/'"]

--

I've got /images soft linked to an 'images' directory under my SR.
title: Fix Xen SR tmp dir when migrating (resizing) instances
